House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: To provide duty-free privileges to participants in, and other individuals associated with, the 1994 World Rowing Championships.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to provide duty-free treatment, through October 30, 1994 to the personal effects of participants in, and other individuals and equipment associated with, the 1994 World Rowing Championships.

titles.title: To provide duty-free privileges to participants in, and other individuals associated with, the 1994 World Rowing Championships.
